NK040(thi)036:1: // lhag ma'i cho ga rgyas par spro na lhag gtor bshams la 'di skad do //
NK040(thi)036:3: las kyi mkha' 'gro mi srun ma //
NK040(thi)036:4: shin tu 'jigs pa king rus gzugs //
NK040(thi)036:5: yan lag rus pa'i 'khor los brgyan //
NK040(thi)036:6: snying khrag 'thung zhing rkan sgra brdeb //
NK040(thi)036:7: rkang mgyogs btul shugs rdzu 'phrul can //
NK040(thi)036:8: dam tshig can gyi las mkhan yin //
NK040(thi)036:9: dam nyams ru tra'i srog gcod yin //
NK040(thi)036:10: lhag ma'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)036:11: dgra bgegs zhing bcu bsgral du gsol //
NK040(thi)036:12: drag po'i las mdzad bstan pa bsrung //
NK040(thi)036:13: khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab //
NK040(thi)036:14: bcol pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)036:17: srin po'i lus la gcan spyang gdong //
NK040(thi)036:18: sbrul nag lce la spyan mig glog /
NK040(thi)036:19: kha rlangs dug la nga ro 'brug /
NK040(thi)036:20: khros pa'i smre ngag ser chen 'beb //
NK040(thi)036:21: mi lpag g.yang gzhi phyogs bzhir brdebs //
NK040(thi)036:23: ba spu mtshon cha me ltar 'bar //
NK040(thi)036:24: bye ba dung phyur 'khor dang bcas //
NK040(thi)036:25: dam tshig can gyi las mkhan ma //
NK040(thi)036:26: dam nyams ru tra'i srog gcod yin //
NK040(thi)036:27: lhag ma'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)036:28: dgra bgegs zhing bcu bsgral du gsol //
NK040(thi)036:29: drag po'i las mdzad bstan pa srungs //
NK040(thi)036:30: khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab //
NK040(thi)036:31: bcol pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)036:33: sha za mkha' 'gro yang sprul tshogs //
NK040(thi)036:34: yi dwags lus la dur bya'i bu //
NK040(thi)036:35: dur khrod rkang la thod pas brgyan //
NK040(thi)036:36: lus la khrag rul chu ser 'babs //
NK040(thi)036:37: smre ngag tshig gis ngur mo dbyangs //
NK040(thi)036:39: ro long rkang la dur khrod lus //
NK040(thi)036:40: phung srin mig la gza' srin lag /
NK040(thi)036:41: dam tshig dam nyams lhag ma'i dgra bgegs drag po'i khyod kyi bcol pa'i b+h+yo /
NK040(thi)036:42: gzhan yang mkha' 'gro pho nya'i tshogs //
NK040(thi)036:43: las la myur mgyogs bstan pa srung //
NK040(thi)036:44: bu chung lus la bya rog mgo //
NK040(thi)036:45: skyug glu'i dbyangs la thi bya'i tshig /
NK040(thi)036:46: ri gsum 'grim zhing lung gsum bskor //
NK040(thi)036:47: chu la zhon nas grib so 'grim //
NK040(thi)036:48: gcan spyang pho mo'i dri la bsnams //
NK040(thi)036:49: da la'i mtha' la bskor zhing nyul //
NK040(thi)036:50: las byed mi sdug 'khor dang bcas //
NK040(thi)036:51: dam tshig can gyi dam nyams lhag ma'i dgra bgegs
NK040(thi)036:52: drag po'i khyed kyi thugs dam bcol pa'i phrin las
